about_the_game:
Slice, burn, torment, drop water, and smash those repulsive dark creatures!
Block the damn dark creatures from entering the portal!
They are rough-skinned and thick-skinned, and very durable.
They are scheming and very disgusting.
They are agile and very tough.

Against such a terrifying opponent, relying solely on brute force is not a wise choice.
We can hire mercenaries and create obstacles to stop the attack.
If the skin is rough and the flesh is thick, you can push it back and torture again, or push it into the sea for a hundred times.

Anchor and video creator:
Creators who are actively promoting, please continue to make videos and live broadcasts. Thank you for your support

Developer: This is a game, do not use this violence against anyone in reality

content_descriptors.notes: There is no adult content in the standard version, and there are naked underpants in the added human like characters

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 9100F
  • Memory: 8192 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • Storage: 8192 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 9100F
  • Memory: 8192 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 2060
